translation.key: {str:Victim} has been muted for {sec:Duration} ({str:Reason})
You are now logged.
Wrong username/password.
An error occured during the operation.
You must be logged for this operation
translation.value: Tibi conscriptum esse opus est, ut hanc operationem conficias.

translation.key: Please wait 5 minutes before create an another account
translation.value: Expecta minutas 5 ante quam recrees adcomputum alium.

translation.key: An error occured during the creation of your account.
translation.value: Error obvenit, quum accomputus creatus est.

translation.key: This username is already taken by an existing account
Your account has been created and you are now logged.
translation.value: Accomputus tuus confectus est tuque iam conscriptus es.

translation.key: You must be logged to see your rank
translation.value: Tibi conscriptum esse opus est, ut decus videas.

translation.key: You must be logged to see your goal
translation.value: Tibi conscriptum esse opus est, ut terminum videas.

Switch language to english ?
You can change the language of this mod using the command /language.
If your language is not available, you can help with translation (/help translate).
translation.value: Si lingua tua non in promptu est, tibi traductioni subvenire licet (/help translate).

translation.key: InfectionClass, by necropotame (version {str:VersionCode})
Based on the concept of Infection mod by Gravity
translation.value: Constat in conceptu modificationis Infection, auctoris Gravity

translation.key: Main contributors: {str:ListOfContributors}
Thanks to {str:ListOfContributors}
No player was found with this name
translation.value: Arenarius huius nominis non repertus est.

translation.key: Rules of the game
InfectionClass is a team game between humans and infected.
translation.value: InfectionClass ludus gregum inter homines infectosque.

translation.key: All players start as human.
10 seconds later, two players become infected.
The goal for humans is to survive until the army clean the map.
translation.value: Finis hominum est supervivere, donec militia arenam repurgat.

translation.key: The goal for infected is to infect all humans.
translation.value: Finis infectorum est inficere homines omnes.

translation.key: How to translate the mod
Create an account on Crowdin and join a translation team:
translation.value: Nomen tibi apud Crowdin da et gregi traductionis accede:

translation.key: For any question about the translation process, please contact us on IRC ({str:IRCAddress})
translation.value: Quaestione de traductionis processu exorta nos via IRC ({str:IRCAddress}) postula

translation.key: The Engineer can build walls with his hammer to block infected.
translation.value: Clavicarius malleo valla infectos inhibendes exstruere potest.

translation.key: When an infected touch the wall, he dies.
translation.value: Quum infectus vallum tangit, tum moritur.

translation.key: The lifespan of a wall is {sec:LifeSpan}, and walls are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Vallum {sec:LifeSpan} constat durare, tummodo arenarius unum solum vallum exstruere potest.

translation.key: The Soldier can pose floating bombs with his hammer.
translation.value: Miles malleo bombas impendentes creare potest.

translation.key: Each bomb can explode {int:NumBombs} times.
translation.one: Bomba posita explosioni uni ideona est.
translation.other: Bomba posita explosioni numeri {int:NumBombs} ideona est.

translation.key: Use the hammer to place the bomb and explode it multiple times.
translation.value: Malleo utere, ut bombam interponas inardescasque pluriens.

translation.key: Bombs are limited to one per player at the same time.
translation.value: Bombae terminatae sunt, ut una arenario quoicumque quandocumque sola exstet.

translation.key: The Scientist can pose floating mines with his hammer.
translation.value: Scientista malleo minas pendentes interponere potest.

translation.key: Mines are limited to {int:NumMines} per player at the same time.
translation.one: Minae terminatae sunt, ut una arenario quoicumque quandocumque exstet.
translation.other: Minae terminatae sunt, ut {int:NumMines} arenario quoicumque quandocumque exstent.

translation.key: He has also grenades that teleport him.
translation.value: Etiam granatas quae eum teleportant habet.

translation.key: The biologist has a shotgun with bouncing bullets and can create a spring laser trap by shooting with his rifle.
translation.value: Biologus sclopetum dispergens cum missilibus reflectentibus habet laqueumque sclopeto laserico struere potest.

translation.key: The Medic can protect humans with his hammer by giving them armor.
translation.value: Medicus malleo tegumina disponens homines tuerier potest.

translation.key: He has also a powerful shotgun that can pullback infected.
translation.value: Etiam sibi sclopetum dispergens habet potens, quod infectos deicere pollet.

translation.key: The Hero has a shotgun, a laser rifle and grenades.
translation.value: Heros sclopetum dispergens, sclopetum lasericum granatasque habet.

translation.key: The Hero must find a flag hidden in the map.
translation.value: Heroi vexillum in mappa reconditum inveniendum est.

translation.key: Once taken, the flag gives 1 health point, 4 armor points, and full ammo to all humans, furthermore full health and armor to the hero.
translation.value: Heroe vexillum indepto punctum unum integritatis valetudinis uniquoique gregis humani redditur, puncta quatuor tegumentorum suppletur et arma replentur, integritas herois penitus.

translation.key: The hero cannot be healed by a medic, but he can withstand a thrust by an infected, an his health suffice.
translation.value: Heros a medico sanari non ideoneus est, sed plagae infecti resistere, quin pereat, si integritas sua huic sufficit.

translation.key: The Ninja can throw flash grenades that can freeze infected during three seconds.
translation.value: Ninja granatas iacere potest quae infectos tres secundas congelare pollent.

translation.key: His hammer is replaced by a katana, allowing him to jump {int:NinjaJump} times before touching the ground.
translation.one: Malleus eius katana permutatus. Quo in manus pervenit, ut insultet semel, antequam solum contingit.
translation.other: Malleus eius katana permutatus. Quo in manus pervenit, ut insultet {int:NinjaJump} temporibus, antequam solum contingit.

translation.key: The Mercenary fly in air using his machine gun.
translation.value: Mercennarius sclopeto polybolico in aere volare potest.

translation.key: He can coil explosives with his hammer that hinder infected from harming.
translation.value: Vasa displosiva quae infectos nocendi valentia distineunt convolvere capax est.

translation.key: He can also throw poison grenades that each deal {int:NumDamagePoints} damage points.
translation.one: Ad hoc granatas veneficas iacere potest quae singulae plagam unam inponunt.
translation.other: Ad hoc granatas veneficas iacere potest quae plagas {int:NumDamagePoints} inponunt.

translation.key: The Sniper can lock his position in air for 15 seconds with his hammer.
translation.value: Sniper malleo positionem 15 secundas claudere in aere potest.

translation.key: He can jump two times in air.
He has also a powerful rifle that deals 30 damage points in locked position, and 10–13 otherwise.
translation.value: Sclopetum striatum habet quod nocet 30 in claustro, 10–13 alias.

translation.key: The Smoker can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Fumigator malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: He can also inflict 4 damage points per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Plagas quoque 4 per secundam unco infligere potest.

translation.key: The Boomer explodes when he attack.
All humans affected by the explosion become infected.
He can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Plagam 1 quoque per secundam unco infligere potest.

translation.key: The Hunter can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Venator malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: The Ghost can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Larua malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: He is invisible, except if a human is near him, if he takes a damage or if he use his hammer.
translation.value: Latens est, donec homo proxumus sit, pugnam experiatur aut malleo utatur.

translation.key: The Spider can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Aranea malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: When selecting any gun, his hook enter in web mode.
translation.value: Quum telum quodlubet seligis, captio eius unco in modum retialem transit.

translation.key: Any human that touch a hook in web mode is automatically grabbed.
translation.value: Homo quicumque uncum in modo retiali tangens apprehenditur.

translation.key: The hook of the spider (in both mode) deal 1 damage point per second and can grab a human during 2 seconds.
translation.value: Uncus araneus (in modos ambobus) plagam 1 infligit et hominem secundas 2 tenet.

translation.key: The Ghoul can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Ġūl malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: He can devore all that has died close to him, which makes him stronger, faster and more resistant.
translation.value: Omnia circa eum mortua devorare potest, quo fortior, celerior firmiorque fiat.

translation.key: Thereupon he digests his fodder bit by bit going back to his normal state, and besides, death bereaves him of his nourishment.
translation.value: Exinde pabulum digerit sensim ad statum vulgarem revolviens, ultro ei letum alimenta detrahit.

translation.key: The Slug can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Limax malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: He can make the ground and walls toxic by spreading slime with his hammer.
translation.value: Solum parietesque veneniferos malleo mucum reddendo potest.

translation.key: Touching the slime inflicts three damage points in three seconds on a human.
translation.value: Contamen muci homini plagas tres per secunda tria infligit.

translation.key: The Undead can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Immortalis malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: Instead of dying, he freezes during 10 seconds.
If an infected heals him, the freeze effect disappear.
translation.value: Quando infectus eum sanat, effectus gelationis decedit.

translation.key: The Witch can infect humans and heal infected with his hammer.
translation.value: Malefica malleo homines inficere infectosque sanare potest.

translation.key: When an infected dies, he may re-spawn near her.
translation.value: Infectus mortuus iuxta eam ab inferis exsistere potest.

translation.key: If the Witch dies, she disappear and is replaced by an another class of infected.
translation.value: Malefica mortua decedit commutaturque infecto classis alius.

translation.key: She can also inflict 1 damage point per second by hooking humans.
translation.value: Plagam 1 quoque per secundam unco infligere potest.

translation.key: Targeted chat messages
Use "/msg <PlayerName> <My Message>" to send a private message to this player.
translation.value: Utere »/msg <Nomen arenarii> <Nuntium meum>«, ut nuntium privatum haec arenario emittas.

translation.key: Use "/msg !<ClassName> <My Message>" to send a private message to all player with a specific class.
translation.value: Utere »/msg !<nomen classis> <Nuntium meum>«, ut nuntium ad arenarios classis specialis collineatum emittas.

translation.key: Example: "/msg !medic I'm wounded!"
Use "/msg !near" to send a private message to all players near you.
translation.value: Utere »/msg !near«, ut nuntium collineatum ad arenarios propinquos emittas.

translation.key: Choose a help page with /help <page>
Available help pages: {str:PageList}
A random class will be automatically attributed to you when rounds start
translation.value: Classis fortuita tibi assignatur, quum ludus incipit

translation.key: The class selector will be displayed when rounds start
translation.value: Selector classis praebebitur, quum ludus incipit

translation.key: Unknown language
Available languages: {str:ListOfLanguage}
List of commands
Press <F3> or <F4> to enable or disable hook protection
translation.value: Preme <F3> aut <F4> ad instructionem protectionis contra captionem

translation.key: You hold a bonus area for one minute, +5 points
translation.value: Zonae seorsae unam minutam immoratus es, +5 copiae

Random choice
Choose your class

Stomach filled by {percent:FodderInStomach}
The witch is dead
The undead is finally dead
Sword velocity increased
Sword strength increased

The Hero found the flag!
